name: Castle Clicker (itch)
description:
This game was made in 3 hours for the friday night game jam: https://itch.io/jam/friday-night-game-jam-2022-40

Some people love sand. Others find it coarse, rough and irritating, and hate that it gets everywhere. 

Castles cost 10 sand to place. Each castle will generate 1 sand every 2 seconds.

There were going to be more sand buildings, but I ran out of time. Enjoy!

Play in fullscreen for best effect because I couldn't get it to look right embedded.
